attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hoping to find a better president for our America, but in reality it just showed me the truth. That this is a terrible, racist, and unreliable platform that should never have existed in the first place. I actually thought that we had a chance with Trump, but after seeing his app and his Twitter, and actually— anything Trump says, I was convinced. Trump is not a rightful President, and never will be.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!

attributes.review: I hate this app because when I opened it my phone shocked my little brother and he passed out 😡😡😡 and it did it again and again then random phone numbers stared calling over and over like every minute  then I deleted the app A huge sirens are going from my phone IM GOING TO HALF TO GET A NEW PHONE IT WONT STOP😡😡🤬🤕🤕🚨🚨and it’s shouting Donald trump 2020 Donald trump 2020 it won’t stop 🛑
attributes.title: This app is horrible I half to get a new phone now

attributes.review: i downloaded this like almost a month ago and until now, it decides to let me use the app. i don’t know what’s going on, everything seems fake and out of no where it started playing the national anthem. it attracted many many infected bugs into my house making me throw up every where. it got to the point where it started sending me constant messages stating that i’m a disgrace to my family if i don’t vote trump 2020. i’m genuinely scared, i tried to uninstall it but it wouldn’t let me, saying that no one could ever do that once you download it. now i’m stuck with- whatever this disgrace of an app this is. very much terrible.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause I thought don don was doing sum then boom!!! I passed out and woke up with brain damage. I went to the hospital and the lady didn’t treat me cause I didn’t have a mask and my brain damaged had advanced to cancer and I was still trying to comprehend how I save 15% on my car insurance that I bought from a lizard. Anyway switch to geico and save 15% or more on car insurance 😂😂😂😂😂🤒
attributes.title: This app gave me cancer!!!!!

attributes.review: This is when I wish the app store made it available to give an app a 0 star rating. But a 1 will have to do to express my disappointment in the app. I seriously cannot think of one good thing about this app. It was so hard to use, always glitched, used up battery percentage like CRAZY! If you are considering downloading this app, DO NOT, UNLESS you give it a 1 star review after.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app.😔It’s so hard for me to even about, but this app DOESN’T even deserve a one star rating😖It doesn’t a ZERO rating. Cuz honey it broke my phone like broke broke my phone. My phone was glitching like crazy.😭And I think it should be taken down and for everyone who wants to download it, DON’T I repeat DON’T!! It soooooo bad🤢. I’m gonna need a new phone now🤦🏾‍♀️.
attributes.title: What is this honey!! I was in shock, I was in tears almost👁💧👄💧👁

attributes.review: How dare bunker boy go and celebrate our countries Independence Day. Doesn’t that make all the other countries feel lesser than the US. This app is spreading hate into this country and I cannot have it. It needs to be taken down from the App Store. Nobody likes it. Bunker boy needs to step down from his high horse because he doesn’t know how to use the power effectively. Get him out of office now
attributes.title: all countries matter

attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it took a whole month and when I open it it gave me std and made my grandma died so i deleted it and no I see no more
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. It took me an HOUR to download and once it did download it was lagging so bad and I have very good WiFi. The quality is bad. I tried contacting people to help me set this up but NO ONE answered. I am angry. I wouldn’t recommend this app to ANYONE. I recommend this app to get taking down immediately before I call the person who is in charge of this app.
attributes.title: If I could I would give it 0 stars

attributes.review: Not only did this app take forever to download and then crash itself it kept turning my phone off completely! Apparently the only way to turn on this app is to be UNDER the age of 13 or be Ivanka 🤷🏻‍♀️ I’m not sure what all that is about.   It just doesn’t seem fair that it’s such a specific range or else Trump 2020 won’t work.
attributes.title: Made my phone crash
